attributes.action: send violent offenders and killer and child molesters to iraq or Afghanistan to help the armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we can't have the death penalty send them some were that has. I am sick of looking around to see if it is safe to park and get out of my car to go in to a shop, or walk past some one in the street in case i get a knife in me or hit with a brick or some thing,  murderers and violent offenders get 4-5 years in a holiday camp and then back to what thay do best.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
